text.text_translated:
We can know about differences. People expect different things. People act in different ways. This helps us avoid miscommunication. Miscommunication is when we do not understand each other.
But we must also remember one thing. Ideas about all people from one culture are stereotypes. Stereotypes are very bad for business. They hurt good business relationships.
A country's culture can shape how we act. It can shape how we think. But many other things also affect us a lot. For example, the place we live. The groups we are with. Our age. If we are a man or a woman. Our company culture. What happens to us in life also affects us.
So, it is good to know about differences. We should remember them. But we must not use this knowledge to put all people from one country into one group.

best_attempt.text_translated:
Knowing about differences is good. People expect different things. People act in different ways. This helps us avoid problems when we talk. We can understand each other better.
But we must remember one important thing. Ideas about all people from one culture are stereotypes. Stereotypes are often not true. Stereotypes are very bad for business. They stop good business relationships.
A country's culture can help us act. It can help us think. But many other things also affect us a lot. For example, the place we live. The groups we are with. Our age. If we are a man or a woman. Our company culture. What happens to us in life also affects us.
So, it is good to know about differences. We should keep this knowledge in our minds. But we must not use it to put all people from one country into one group. We must remember: every person is different.
